posts.postText:
Hey my IGN is Surfer currently and it says i was banned for repeatedly rtv'ing in the middle of the round yet i was kicked twice and was told to refer to rule 34...i asked one of the guys that were on and they said that it was the "No porn rule"....I admit to "rtv"'ing but i was only kicked so why was i banned when i went offline? I mean i woke up the next morning ready to play my Saturday morning and it says "Sorry you've been banned". Yeah kinda screwed up my morning:P Haha so im hoping i get a reply to this soon that way i can play tonight. Thanks
          Sincerely,
                   Surfer

Please use this template
 1) Which server:
2) Your in-game name: 
3) Your SteamID: 
4) When were you banned and for how long:
5) Reason for ban:
6) Who banned you:
7) Why should we unban you or shorten your ban period: 

You can look here for the reason as to why you were banned.

I don't even care about formality anymore, I banned you mostly because of the rdm, not the rtving. The constant rtving only added to the ban time.
You were told the first time you were kicked that it was rule 7, while the morons kept yelling rule 34. You still choose to rtv after we explained to read the !motd, and the rule itself.
